# JDutils

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A collection of useful functions for small but frequent tasks.

## Installation

You can install the development version of JDutils from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jenny-davies/JDutils")
```
